def_cn: 不正确的;虚假的;错误的
def_en: If something is false, it is incorrect, untrue, or mistaken.
You use false to describe objects which are artificial but which are intended to look like the real thing or to be used instead of the real thing.

def_cn: (人)虚伪的;(举动)装腔作势的
def_en: If you describe a person or their behaviour as false, you are criticizing them for being insincere or for hiding their real feelings.
